Qiu ni yanhuan women yihui'er, women yiding xiangying ni de zhaohuan, yiding fucong shizhemen.”[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nandao nimen yiqian meiyou faguo shi, nimen jue bu hui miewang ma?
Nimen ceng juzhu zai zi qi zhe zhuguo di difang, nimen hen qingchu wo shi ruhe chengzhi tamen de. Wo wei nimen shele xuduo biyu.
Tamen que yi gao yinmou, dan an la you fa zuzhi tamen de yinmou, buguan tamen de yinmou you duoda, ye jue buneng yidong qun shan.”
Ni jue buyao renwei an la hui dui ta de shizhemen shuangyue. An la que shi quanneng de, zhangguan baoying de.
Zai na ri, dadi jiang bian cheng ling yige dadi, tian jiang bian cheng ling yige tian. Tamen [renlei] jiang chuxian zai du yi de, wanneng de an la mianqian [shoushen].
Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian fanzui zhe daizhe jiaoliao bei shuan zai yiqi.
Tamen chuan de yifu shi liqing zuo de, huo longzhaozhe tamen de lian [zhu].
Yibian an la yi mei ren suo zuo de shan e jinxing baochou. An la que shi qingsuan shensu de.

Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi dui renlei de yige qishi, yibian tamen yinci er shou jinggao, yibian tamen zhidao, ta [an la] zhishi du yi ying shou chongbai de zhu [zhu], yibian you lizhi de renmen ji zhu jiaoxun.
Ai lifu, lia mu, la [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi]. Zhexie shi jingdian [“gulanjing”] de jing wen, shi mingbai de “gulanjing”[de jing wen].
Bu xinyang zhe yexu hui xiwang ziji yuan shi guishun zhe [musilin].
Ni rang tamen chihe wanle ba! Ni rang tamen bei wangxiang [zhu] mihuo ba! Tamen bujiu jiang zhidao.
Fanshi wo suo huimie de chengshi, ta dou you yige dingqi.
Renhe yige minzu dou bu hui zai qi dingqi qian xiaowang, ye bu hui yanhuan.
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“Shou ci jiaohui [“gulanjing”] de ren [mu sheng] a! Ni zhenshi ge fengzi.
Ni weisheme bu zhaoshi women yixie tianshi ne? Jiaru ni shi chengshi zhe.”
Wo zhi yi zhenli jiang shi tianshi, fouze [ruguo wo jiang shi tianshi], tamen jiang bu bei huanxing.
Wo que yi jiang shi jiaohui [“gulanjing”], wo jiushi jiaohui de baohu zhe.
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian xuduo shizhe qu jiaohua xiri de ge zongpai [zhu].
Mei dang yi wei shizhe lailin tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiao ta.
Wo ruci shi ta [duo shen chongbai] jinru fanzui zhe de xinzhong.
Tamen bu xiangxin [wo de] jiaohui [“gulanjing”], jinguan qian ren [bu xinyang an la er zao chengfa] de xianli yi shiqu.
Jiaru wo wei tamen cong tianshang kai yidaomen, tamen biding cong na daomen kaishi deng tian,
tamen biding shuo:“Women yanhualiaoluanle, bu, women shi bei mihuo de minzhong.”
Wo que yi zai tiankong chuangzao xuduo gong zuo, bing wei guancha zhe zhuangshi ta.
Wo baohu ta yuanli yiqie bei quzhu de emo de qinfan,
wei qieting de emo liwai,[yinwei] ta you mingxian de huoyan zhuiganzhe.
Wo zhankaile dadi, zai shangmian wengu de anzhi qun shan, bing zai qizhong shengchan chu ge zhong jun liang zhi wu.
Wo zai qizhong wei nimen he nimen buneng gongyang zhe [shengchu yu yeshou deng] chuangzaole xuduo shenghuo ziliao.
Wanwu zai wo zheli dou you zhucun chu, wo zhi yidingliang jiangxia ta.
Wo paiqian feng [gei nong yun] shoujing, ranhou, wo cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, gong nimen yinyong, nimen jue bushi yushui de zhucun zhe.
Wo dique neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si [zhu]. Wo shi wanwu de jicheng zhe.
Wo que zhi nimen yi shiqu de xianbei, ye que zhi nimen de xian bei he houbei.
Ni de zhu bi jiang jihe tamen. Ta que shi zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de [zhu].
Wo que yi yong heise de niantu chuangzao ren.
Yiqian, wo ceng yong huoyan chuangzao jingling.
Dangshi, ni de zhu dui tianshimen shuo:“Wo jiang yong heise de niantu chuangzao yige ren [a dan].
Dang wo zao wan ta bing ba linghun chui ru ta [a dan] de tinei shi, nimen dang fucong ta.”
Suoyou tianshi dou fucongle,
wei yi bu lisi liwai, ta jujue tong tianshimen yiqi fucong.
Ta [an la] shuo:“Yi bu lisi a! Ni weisheme butong tianshimen yiqi fucong ne?”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo buneng fucong ni yong heise niantu chuangzao de ren.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni cong zheli [leyuan] chuqu ba! Ni shi bei quzhu de.
Ni bi jiang chang zao qianze, zhidao shenpan ri.”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuan yan wo dao tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na yitian.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni bei kuan yanle,
zhidao zhuding de shi ri.”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Youyu ni rang wo likaile zhengdao, wo bi jiang zai da dishang youhuo tamen [renlei], bi jiang youpian tamen suoyou ren,
tamen zhong ni suo te xuan de puren chuwai.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Zhe shi wo gai weichi de zhengdao.
Ni jue meiyou nengli duifu wo de pu renmen [zhen xinshi], dan zhuisui ni de mi wu zhe liwai.
Huo yu que shi tamen quanti yueding di difang.
Huo yu you qi daomen, mei dao men du jiang shourong tamen zhong pi zhiding de yibufen ren [zhu].
Jingwei zhe bi jiang jin zhu leyuan he quanshui pang.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen pingping'an'an jinru leyuan ba!”
Wo jiang xiaochu tamen [jingwei zhe] xinzhong [bici jian keneng cunzai] de yuanhen, tamen jiang xiongdi ban mianduimian zuo zai bao yi shang.
Tamen zai leyuan li ji bu hui pijuan, ye bu hui bei zhu zou.
Ni dang gaosu wo de pu renmen:“Wo que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Wo de xingfa que shi tongku de xingfa.”
Ni dang gaosu tamen guanyu yi bu la xin de kerenmen [tianshimen] de gushi.
Dangshi, tamen [tianshimen] jinqu jian ta. Tamen [tianshimen] shuo:“Qiu zhu ci ni ping an!” Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Women feichang haipa nimen.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa, women bi jiang yi yige jingming de nanhai xiang ni baoxi [zhu].”
Ta shuo:“Nimen zai wo nianmai shi hai gei wo baoxi ma? Nimen yao gei wo bao shenme xi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women yi zhenli xiang ni baoxi, suoyi, ni buyao juewang.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Chu mi wu zhe wai, shei hui dui ta de zhu [an la] de enhui juewang ne?”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Shizhemen [tianshimen] a! Nimen de shiming shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women fengming lai chengzhi yi huo fanzui de minzhong,
dan lu te de jiaren chuwai, women yi ding ba tamen quanbu jiuchu,
dan ta de qizi liwai.[An la shuo]:“Wo yi zhuding ta [lu te de qizi] tong liu zai houmian de renmen yiqi [bei huimie].”
Dang shizhemen [tianshimen] lai dao lu te de jiali shi,
ta shuo:“Nimen shi yiqun mosheng ren.”
Tamen shuo:“Bu, women gei ni dai laile tamen suo huaiyi de [xingfa],
women gei ni dai laile zhenli [ni de zuren yao bei huimie de xiaoxi], women suo jiang de dou shi shihua.
Ni daizhe ni de jiaren zai wu geng chuzou ba! Ni dang gen zai tamen houmian, nimen zhong renhe ren dou buyao huitou kan. Nimen dao nimen suo bei mingling di difang qu ba!”
Wo rang ta zhidao zhege panjue: Zhexie ren [fanzui zhe] jiang zai zaochen bei genjue.
Cheng li ren xinran lai dao [lu te de jiali].
Ta [lu te] shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de keren, nimen buyao rang wo diulian.
Nimen dang jingwei an la, nimen buyao rang wo shou xiuru.”
Tamen [cheng li ren] shuo:“Nandao women meiyou jinzhi ni tong wairen jiaowang ma?”
Ta [lu te] shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de nu'er [ben zuren zhi nu], jiaru nimen yiding yao zuo.”
Yi ni [mu sheng] de shouming fashi, tamen [bu xiangxin ni de shiming zhe] bi jiang zai tamen de taozui zhong gengjia mangcong.
Kongbu sheng zai fuxiao shi xijile tamen.
Wo shi na zuo chengshi tianfandifu, wo jiangxia shaoguo de taotu ban de shi kuai chengfa tamen.
Dui neng sikao de renmen, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Na zuo chengshi jiu zai [mai jia zhi xuliya de] dalu pang.
Dui xinshimen, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
Conglin de jumin [ru an la paiqian shu abu shengren qu jiaohua de ma de ya ren deng] que shi bu yi zhe.
Wo chengfale tamen. Zhe liang ge difang dou zai pingtan de dadao shang.
Shigu de jumin que yi bu xinyang shizhemen [zhu].
Wo ceng ciyu tamen xuduo jixiang, dan tamen zong shi beiqi ta.
Tamen ceng zao shan wei wu, yiwei keyi anju.
Dan kongbu sheng zai fuxiao shi xijile tamen.
Tamen guoqu suo zuo de yiqie dui tamen wuyile.

Wo zhi yi zhenli chuangzao tiandi wanwu. Fuhuo de shijian kending shi yao lailin de, suoyi, ni [mu sheng] dang kuanrong tamen de guocuo [ci jie jing wen zai shengzhan ding wei zhuming qian yi jiang shi].
Ni de zhu que shi chuangzao wanwu zhe, quan zhi zhe.
Wo que yi ci ni chang songdu de qi jie jing wen [zhu][ji “gulanjing” shou zhangfa ti ha] he weida de “gulanjing”.
Dui wo ciyu tamen [bu xinyang zhe] zhong ge zhong ren xiangshou de, ni buyao xianmu, buyao ti tamen youchou. Ni dang qianhe di duidai xinshimen.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo que shi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Zhengru wo jiang gei fenlie zhe [jidu jiaotu he youtai jiaotu] de yiyang.
Tamen [fenlie zhe] ba “gulanjing” fencheng xuduo bufen [xiangxin yibufen, fouren yibufen].
Yi ni de zhu fashi, wo bi jiang shenwen tamen quanti,
bi jiang shenwen tamen suo zuo de [e xing].
Ni dang gongkai xuanbu ni suo feng dao de mingling, ni dang yuan bi bai ouxiang zhe.
Wo zuyi rang ni duifu chaoxiao zhe.
Tamen [chaoxiao zhe] ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling, tamen bujiu jiang zhidao [chongbai shenling de houguo].
Wo shen zhi ni wei tamen suo shuo de xiongzhong fannao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang zanmei songyang [zhu] ni de zhu [an la], dang tong koutou zhe yiqi koutou.
Ni dang chongbai ni de zhu, zhidao buke bimian de shike [siwang] jianglin ni [zhu].

An la de mingling [fuhuo de shi jian huo dui bu xinyang zhe de chengfa deng] jijiang lailin, suoyi, nimen buyao jiyu qiu cheng. Zanmei ta chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Ta pai tianshimen feng ta de mingling jianglin tasuo yiyu de puren [bing shuo]:“Nimen dang jinggao [renlei]: Chu wo wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu, yinci, nimen dang jingwei wo.”
Ta yi zhenli chuangzaole tiandi, zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Ta you yidi jingye chuangzaole ren, er ren turan chengle yige gongkai de fankang zhe.
Ta wei nimen er chuangzao shengchu,[nimen] you ci ke huode [mao he pi zuo de] yizhuo [yuhan], hai you xuduo yichu, nimen ke chi qi rurou.
Dang nimen [wanshang] ba shengchu gan hui jia,[zaoshang] ba shengchu gan chuqu fangmu shi, nimen congzhong huodele rongyao.
Shengchu ba nimen de huowu yun dao nimen xu jing xinlao caineng daoda di difang. Nimen de zhu que shi ren'ai de, te ci de [zhu].
[Ta chuangzaole] ma, luo he lu [zhu], yi gong nimen cheng qi he zhuangshi. Ta hai chuangzaole [qita] nimen suo bu zhidao de.
An la fuze chanming zhengdao [yisilan jiao de jiaoyi jiaogui deng], dan youxie dao shi beili zhengdao de. Jiaru ta yiyu, ta hui yindao nimen quanti zunxing zhengdao.
Shi ta cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, nimen ke yinyong, zhiwu ke jie ci shengzhang, nimen ke fangmu.
Ta jie ci wei nimen shengchan chu zhuangjia, ganlan, ye zao, putao he ge zhong shuiguo. Dui neng sikao de minzhong, ci zhong que you yi zhong jixiang.
Ta shi zhouye he ri yue wei nimen fuwu, qunxing ye feng ta de mingling [wei nimen] fuwu. Dui neng mingli de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Ta zai dadishang wei nimen chuangzaole wucaibinfen zhi wu [dong zhiwu deng]. Dui neng sikao de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.

Shi ta shi dahai [wei nimen] fuwu [zhu], yibian nimen congzhong huoqu xinxian de rou chi [ru yu lei], yibian nimen congzhong huoqu nimen suo peidai de zhuangshi wu. Ni kanjian chuanbo zai dahai zhong chengfengpolang [hangyun], yibian nimen xunqiu ta [an la] de enhui [ru ba huowu cong jia di yunwang yi di], yibian nimen gan'en.
Ta zai da dishang wengu de anzhile qun shan, yimian nimen sui da di er yaodang.[Ta kaipile] xuduo heliu he daolu, yibian nimen huode yindao.
[Ta zai baizhou shezhile] xuduo lubiao [lu biao],[zai heiye shezhile] xuduo xingchen, tamen [renlei] jie ci ke huode yindao.
Nandao chuangzao zhe [an la] he buneng chuangzao zhe [ouxiang] shi yiyang de ma? Nimen zenme hai bu juewu ne?
Jiaru nimen yao tongji an la de enhui, name, nimen shi suan bu jin de. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Fanshi nimen suo yincang de he gongkai de, an la quanzhidao.
Tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] she an la er qiqiu de ouxiang shi jue buneng chuangzao renhe dongxi de,[yinwei] tamen ziji yeshi bei chuangzao de.
Naxie ouxiang shi si de, meiyou shengming, tamen bu zhidao tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] he shi jiang bei fuhuo.
Nimen ying chongbai de zhu zhishi du yi de zhu [an la]. Fan bu xinyang houshi zhe, tamen de xin shi fouren [an la du yi] de, tamen shi jiao'ao zi da de [zhu].
Wuyi, fanshi tamen suo yincang de he gongkai de, an la quan zhidao. Ta jue bu xihuan jiao'ao zi da zhe.
Dangshi, you hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen de zhu [an la] ceng jiang shi shenme [gei mu sheng]?” Tamen shuo:“Qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.”
Fuhuo ri, tamen jiang fudan tamen de quanbu zui'e, yiji yin wuzhi er bei tamen wudao zhe de yixie zui'e. Xuzhi, tamen suo fudan de zhen elie!
Tamen de qian ren que yi gao yinmou, dan an la chedi cuihuile tamen de jianzhu, wuding cong shangmian luo zai tamen de tou shang, xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang jianglin tamen.

Ranhou, fuhuo ri, ta hai yao lingru tamen. Ta jiang shuo:“Nimen ceng yuxin shimen zhenglun de wo de huobanmen [xianzai] zai nali?” Shou ci zhishi zhe jiang shuo:“Jintian, bu xinyang zhe bi shou lingru he tongku de xingfa.

Tianshimen jiang zai tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shi ziji shou sun [gan zui] de qingkuang xia rang tamen siwang.” Tamen jiang [jia] qufu [shuo]:“Women weiceng zuo'e.”[Tianshimen huida shuo]:“Bu! Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi quan zhi de.
Yinci, nimen cong huo yu zhi men jinqu bing yong ju qizhong ba [zhu]! Jiao'ao zi da zhe de guisu zhen elie!”

[Dangshi], you hua sheng dui jingwei zhe shuo:“Nimen de zhu [an la] ceng jiang shi shenme [gei mu sheng]?” Tamen shuo:“Zui hao de [yanci].” Zai jinshi xingshan zhe bi you shan bao, dan houshi de zhuzhai cai shi zui hao de. Jingwei zhe de zhuzhai [leyuan] duo mei a!
Tamen jiang jinru yongjiu de leyuan, zhu he cong qizhong liuguo. Fanshi tamen xiang yao de, tamen zai leyuan li dou neng dedao. An la ruci baochou jingwei zhe.

Tianshimen jiang zai tamen [jingwei zhe] chunzhen wu xie de qingkuang xia rang tamen siwang. Tianshimen [jiang dui tamen] shuo:“Qiu zhu ci nimen ping'an! Nimen yin nimen [zai chenshi] suo zuo de shangong jinru leyuan ba!”

Nandao tamen [bu xinyang zhe] hai zai dengdai tianshimen jianglin tamen [shi tamen siwang], huo ni de zhu de mingling [xingfa huo fuhuo ri] jianglin [tamen] ma? Tamen de qian ren ye ceng zheyang zuo. An la wei kuidai tamen, er shi tamen shi ziji shou sun.
Tamen suo zuo de eguo jianglin tamenle, tamen suo chaoxiao de [xingfa] baowei zhu tamenle.

Bai ouxiang zhe shuo:“Jiaru an la yiyu, women he women de zuxian ji bu hui she ta er chongbai renhe dongxi, women ye bu hui wei jing ta de mingling er shanzi jin zhi renhe dongxi.” Tamen de qian ren ye ceng zheyang zuoguo. Shizhemen de zeren zhishi mingbai di chuanda [qishi].

Mei ge minzu zhong, wo du paiqianle yi wei shizhe [bing xuangao]:“Nimen dang chongbai an la, dang yuan bi emo.” Tamen zhong youxie shi huo an la yindao de, youxie shi gai mi wu de. Nimen dang zai da dishang luxing, guancha fouren zhenli zhe de jieju ruhe!
Jishi ni [mu sheng] kewang tamen neng huode yindao, an la ye jue bu hui yindao shi ren mi wu zhe. Tamen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Tamen yi an la fachu tamen zui zhuangyan de shiyan:“An la jue bu hui shi sizhe fuhuo.” Bu![Ta bi jiang shi sizhe fuhuo], zhe shi [ta xu xia de] zhenshi de nuoyan, dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Yibian ta wei tamen chanming tamen suo fenqi de, yibian bu xinyang zhe zhidao ziji yuan shi shuohuang zhe.
Dang wo xiang chuangzao yi jian shiwu shi, wo zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.
Zai shou pohai zhihou wei an la zhidao qianju zhe, wo bi zai jinshi ciyu tamen youmei de jiayuan, dan houshi de baochou cai shi zuida de, jiaru tamen zhidao.
Tamen shi jianren de, tamen xinlai tamen de zhu [an la].

Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo ceng paiqian xuduo nanren [zuo shizhe] bing qishi tamen [ru quan renlei xinyang du yi de an la]. Jiaru nimen bu zhidao, nimen keyi xunwen jieshou jiaohui de renmen [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” de xuezhe].

[Wo ceng paiqian tamen] daizhe mingzheng he jingdian [qu jiaohua renlei]. Wo jiang shi ni [mu sheng] jiaohui [“gulanjing”], yibian ni xiang renlei chanming yi jiang gei tamen de [qishi], yibian tamen shensi.
Nandao yinmou zuo'e zhe you bawo an la bu hui shi dadi tunmo tamen [zhu], huo xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang jianglin tamen ma?
Huo zai tamen lai lai wangwang [de gongzuo] zhong chengzhi tamen, yizhi tamen buneng taotuo [an la de chengfa] ma?
Huo zhujian [yi sun shen shi cai de fangshi] chengzhi tamen ma? Nimen de zhu que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha an la suo chuangzao de wanwu, qi yinying shi ruhe pianxiang youbian he zuobian, qianbei de koubai an la ma?
Tiandi jian de yiqie, wulun shi you shengming de bei zaowu, haishi tianshimen, tamen dou koubai an la, tamen dou bu ganzi da.
Tamen weiju zai tamen zhi shang de zhu [an la], tamen zunxing ziji suo bei mingling de. Koutou chu
an la shuo:“[Renlei a!] Nimen buyao chongbai liang ge zhuzai, ying shou chongbai de zhuzai zhiyouyige [zhu][ji an la], nimen zhi neng weiju wo.”
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de, shuncong yongyuan zhi gui ta [shuncong an la shi renlei de yiwu]. Nandao nimen hai yao she an la er jingwei qita shenling ma?
Fanshi nimen suo xiangshou de enhui, dou shi cong an la jiang shi de. Ranhou, dang nimen zaoyu buxing shi, nimen zhi xiang ta qiuzhu.
Ranhou, dang ta wei nimen jiechu buxing shi, nimen zhong youxie ren mashang jiu gei tamen de zhu [an la] shezhi huoban,
yizhi tamen gufule wo suo ciyu tamen de enhui. Nimen [zhanshi] xiangle ba! Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao [huihen].
Fanshi wo suo ciyu tamen de, tamen dou fen yi fen qu gongfeng tamen suo bu zhi dao de [ouxiang]. Yi an la fashi! Nimen bi jiang bei shenwen nimen suo niezao de.
Tamen ba nuhai fen gei an la. Zanmei ta chaojue! Tamen ba tamen suo kewang de [nanhai] fen ji ziji.
Dang tamen zhong youren huoxi [ziji de qizi] sheng nuhai de xiao xi shi, ta de lian mashang bian de yin'an, neixin chongman fennu.
Ta wei tasuo huode de e xun er duobi zuren.[Ta ziwen]:“Shi renru liu xia ta ne, haishi ba ta huomai zai tu li [zhu]?” Xuzhi, tamen suo panjue de zhen elie!
Bu xinyang houshi zhe, tamen jun you elie de pinxing, er an la you zhigaowushang de shuxing. Ta [an la] shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.

Jiaru an la yaoyin renlei de bu yi er chengfa tamen, name, ta bu hui zai dadishang liu xia yige huo wu, dan ta ba tamen yanhuan dao yige dingqi. Dang tamen de qixian lailin shi, tamen ji buneng yanhuan pianke, ye buneng tiqian [pianke].

Tamen ba ziji suo yanwu de guiyu an la, tamen wangyan ziji jiang huode zui hao de dongxi. Wuyi, tamen jiang huode dique shi huo yu [zhu],[tamen jiang bei shouxian gan ru huo yu], tamen jiang bei qizhi qizhong.

Yi an la fashi! Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian xuduo shizhe qu jiaohua ge minzu, dan emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen. Jintian [zai chenshi], emo shi tamen de baohu zhe,[fuhuo ri] tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
Wo jiang shi ni [mu sheng] zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”], zhi weile rang ni xiang tamen chanming tamen suo fenqi de, shi dui xinyang de minzhong de yindao he ci min.
An la cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shi kusi de da di fusu. Dui neng tingcong de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
Zai shengchu zhong, dui nimen que you yi zhong jiaoxun, wo shi nimen yinyong na chuzi tamen fu zhong, you paixie wu he xieye zhi jian tilian chulai de chunjing kekou de ruzhi [zhu].
Cong ye zao shu he putao shu de guozi zhong, nimen ke zhaqu jiu [ci jie jing wen zai jinjiu ling banbu qian yi jiang shi] he meishi. Dui neng mingli de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
Ni de zhu ceng qishi mifeng:“Ni zai shanshang, shu shang he tamen suo jian zhi wu [fengfang] zhong zuo chao ba!

Ranhou, ni qu chi ge zhong shuiguo ba! Ni dang gongshun de zunxing ni de zhu de dao.” Jiang youyi zhong yanse butong de yinliao cong ta de fu zhong liuchu, ke wei renlei zhi bing. Dui neng sikao de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
An la chuangzao nimen, ranhou you shi nimen siwang. Nimen zhong youren huo dao tongku de laonian [zhu], yizhi ta mingli hou you hutule. An la que shi quanzhi de, wanneng de.

An la zai caifu shang shi nimen yibufen ren you yu ling yibufen ren, er caifu youyue zhe jue bu yuan ba tamen de caifu shishe gei tamen suo yongyou de nuli, cong'er shi tamen dou shou tongdeng de zunjing. Nandao tamen yao fouren an la de enhui ma?
An la yi nimen de tonglei zuo nimen de qizi, cong nimen de qizi zhong wei nimen chuangzao zisun houdai, bing ci nimen jiamei zhi wu. Nandao tamen yao xin xuwang [ouxiang] er fouren an la de enhui ma?
Tamen she an la er chongbai naxie buneng cong tiandi jian wei tamen tigong renhe jiyang de ouxiang, naxie ouxiang yongyuan meiyou zhe zhong nengli.
Nimen buyao na an la she biyu. An la zhidao, er nimen bu zhidao.

An la she ge biyu:[Yige xinshi he yige bu xinyang zhe], yige shi shou guanzhi de nuli [bu xinyang zhe], ta buneng ziyou chuli renhe shi; ling yige shi wo ciyu jiamei jiyang zhe [xinshi], ta keyi anzhong he gongkai shiyong [ziji de shou ci wu]. Zhe liang ren shi yiyang de ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.

An la she ling yige biyu: You liang geren, qizhong yige shi yaba [bu xinyang zhe], ta buneng ziyou chuli renhe shi, fan chengle ta de zhuren de leizhui, wulun pai ta qu nali, ta dou zuo bu hao; ling yige shi quan ren zhuchi gongdao bing zunxing zhengdao zhe [zhu][xinshi]. Zhe liang ren shi yiyang de ma?
Tiandi jian de yiqie wei jian zhi wu dou shi an la de. Fuhuo shijian de lailin, youru zhuanshun zhi jian [zhu], huo geng kuai. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
An la shi nimen cong nimen de mu fu zhong chusheng,[na shi] nimen shenme ye bu zhidao. Ta [an la] wei nimen chuangzao er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], yibian nimen gan'en.
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian tiankong zhong fucong [an la zhi ming] de niao lei ma? Wei an la caineng kongzhi tamen [pingheng feixing]. Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

An la yi nimen de jia zuo nimen de anju zhi suo, yi shengchu de pige zuo nimen de fangwu [zhangpeng], nimen zai qianyi he dingju shi hui gandao qingbian. Ta yi mianyangmao, luotuo mao, shan yang mao gong nimen bianzhi zhuangshi wu [yiwu yu ditan deng] he zhanshi de xiangshou.

An la cong ta de chuangzao wu ci gei nimen zhebi, yi qun shan zuo nimen de duobi chu, yi yifu gong nimen fangshu [yuhan], yi kuijia gong nimen fangshen. Ta ruci wancheng ta dui nimen de enhui, yibian nimen guishun [yisilan jiao].
Jiaru tamen beili, name, ni [mu sheng] de zeren zhishi mingbai di chuanda [zhu][qishi].
Tamen renshile an la de enhui, dan tamen rengran fouren ta, tamen da duoshu ren shi wang'enfuyi de.
Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong renming yi wei zuozheng zhe [ji renming mei ge minzu de shizhe], ranhou, bu xinyang zhe ji buneng zuo renhe bianjie, ye bude zai qiu zhu en.
Dang bu yi zhe kanjian xingfa shi,[na shi] tamen [suo shou de xingfa] ji bu hui bei jianqing, ye bu hui bei huanxing.

Dang bai ouxiang zhe kanjian tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang shi, tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zhexie shi women de ouxiang, shi women cengjing she ni er qiqiu de.” Ci shi naxie ouxiang jiang fanbo tamen shuo:“Nimen que shi shuohuang zhe.”
Zai na ri, tamen jiang xiang an la biaoshi qufu, tamen suo niezao de ouxiang jiang paoqi tamen er xiaoshi.
Fan bu xinyang bing fang'ai [bieren zunxing] an la zhi dao zhe, wo jiang yin tamen suo zuo de e xing er shi tamen shou jiabei de xingfa.

Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong renming yi wei zuozheng zhe lai fanzheng tamen, wo jiang rang ni [mu sheng] lai fanzheng zhexie ren. Wo yi jiang shi ni zhe bu chanming wanshi wanwu de jingdian [“gulanjing”], shi dui guishun zhe [musilin] de yindao, ci min he xixun.

An la dique mingling renmen gongzheng [ru chongbai du yi de an la deng], xingshan [zhu][ru luxing dui an la de yiwu deng], zhouji qinshu; ta jinzhi renmen jianyin, zuo'e he pohai. Ta quan jie nimen, yibian nimen jieshou quangao.
Nimen dang luxing dui an la de xu yue. Nimen ji yi an la zuowei nimen de baozheng zhe, nimen zai dingli jianshi de mengyue hou jiu bu gai huiyue. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quanzhi de.

Nimen buyao xiang nage nuren yiyang, ta ba ziji fang hao de sha you chai kaile. Nimen yi shiyan zuowei nimen jian huxiang qizha de shouduan, yimian yizu ren bi ling yizu ren [renkou] geng duo. An la jin yi ci kaoyan nimen. Fuhuo ri, ta bi wei nimen chanming nimen suo fenqi de [xinshi xinyang an la ji qi shizhe mu sheng, buxinyang zhe ze fouren an la ji qi shizhe mu sheng, zhe jiushi tamen zai jinshi suo fenqi de].

Jiaru an la yiyu, ta bi shi nimen chengwei yige minzu, dan ta yu shi shei mi wu, jiu shi shei mi wu; yu yindao shei zunxing zhengdao, jiu yindao shei zunxing zhengdao. Nimen bi jiang bei shenwen nimen cengjing suo zuo de.

Nimen buyao yi shiyan zuowei nimen jian huxiang qizha de shouduan, yimian zhan wen zhihou you shizu. Nimen jiang yin fang'ai bieren zunxing an la zhidao er changshi eguo, nimen bi shou zhongda de xingfa.
Nimen buyao yi dui an la de xu yue huanqu disu de daijia [zhu], zai an la na li you dui nimen zui hao de, jiaru nimen zhidao.
Fanshi nimen suo yongyou de, dou shi yao xiaoshi de; fanshi an la suo yongyou de, dou shi yongheng de. Wo bi jiang yi jianren zhe suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou tamen [houshi jin leyuan].
Wulun nannu, shei xinyang bing xingshan, wo bi shi ta [zai jinshi]guo shang meiman de shenghuo, wo bi jiang yi tamen suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou tamen [houshi jin leyuan].
Dang ni yao songdu “gulanjing” shi, ni dang qiu an la baohu, mian zao bei quzhu de emo de qinrao.
Emo dui xinyang bing xinlai tamen de zhu [an la] de ren que shi wunengweili de.
Ta de quanli zhi xianyu yu ta wei you zhe, yiji gei ta [an la] shezhi huoban zhe.

Dang wo jiang shi [“gulanjing” de] yi jie jing wen tihuan ling yi jie jing wen shi, an la zui zhidao tasuo jiang shi de. Tamen [buxinyang zhe] shuo:“Ni [mu sheng] zhishi yige weizao zhe.” Bu, tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhi dao.
Ni shuo:“Shengling [zhu][ji bu li lei tianshi] yi cong ni de zhu yi zhenli jiang shi “gulanjing”, yibian shi xinshimen [de xinyang] jianding, shi dui guishun zhe [musilin] de yindao he xixun.”

Wo que zhi tamen [bu xinyang zhe] hui shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi yige fanren [zhu] chuanshou ta [mu sheng] de.” Tamen suo zhi di nage ren jiang de shi waiguo hua, er zhe bu “gulanjing” que shi mingbai de alabo yu.
Fan bu xinyang an la de jixiang zhe, an la jue bu yindao tamen. Tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa.
Wei bu xinyang an la de jixiang zhe cai hui niezao huangyan, zhexie ren que shi shuohuang zhe.

Shei zai xinyang an la hou you biaoshi bu xin——chufei ta shi bei po xuancheng bu xin, er qi neixin shi duxin de, dan shei ziyuan bu xinyang, tamen bi zao an la de qian nu, bi shou zhongda de xingfa [zhu].
Zhe shi yinwei tamen xi'ai jinshi sheng yu houshi [zhu]. An la jue bu yindao bu xinyang de minzhong.
Zhexie ren jiushi bei an la fengbile xin ermu di ren, zhexie ren que shi diaoyiqingxin de ren.
Wuyi, tamen zai houshi que shi sunshi zhe.
Ranhou, fan shou pohai hou qianyi zhe, ranhou [wei an la zhi dao] fendou bing jianren zhe, cihou, ni de zhu dui tamen que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de [zhu].
Zai na ri, mei ren dou jiang wei ziji bianjie, mei ren dou jiang huode ziji [zai chenshi] suo zuo shan e ying de de baochou, bu shou kuidai.

An la she ge biyu: Yige chengshi [mai jia] yuan shi anquan de, shi feichang manzu de, fengfu de jiyang [shangpin] cong ge fang yun lai, dan ta [mai jia de jumin] gufule an la de enhui [zhu], yinci, an la yin tamen suo zuo de e xing [fouren mu sheng deng] shi tamen changshile hanjian de jihuang he kongju.
Chuzi tamen ben zu de yi wei shizhe [mu sheng] que yi lailin tamen, dan tamen fouren ta, suoyi, xingfa zai tamen xing bu yi shi chengzhile tamen.
Fanshi an la ci gei nimen de, nimen dang chi hefa er jiamei de. Nimen dang ganxie an la de enhui, jiaru nimen zhi chongbai ta.

Ta zhi jinzhi nimen chi: Zi si wu, xieye, zhurou he nian fei an la zhi ming er zai de. Dan ruoshi pobudeyi er bingfei xiang weikang, qie wei chaoyue fadu zhe, name,[chi zhexie jinwu meiyou zuiguo]. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Nimen buyao yong nimen de she wangyan:“Zhe shi hefa de, na shi feifa de.” Yibian nimen jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan. Fan jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan zhe shi jue bu hui chenggong de [zhu].
Na zhishi duanzan de xiangle, tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa.

Duiyu youtai jiaotu, ci [“gulanjing” de shengchu zhang jiang shi] qian, wo ceng jinzhi tamen shiyong wo xiang ni [mu sheng] ti dao di naxie dongxi. Wo meiyou kuidai tamen, er shi tamen shi ziji shou sun.
Ranhou, fan yin wuzhi er zuo'e, ranhou huiguo zi xin zhe, cihou, ni de zhu dui tamen que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Yi bu la xin que shi [lingdao zhe de] yige biaoshuai, ta fucong an la, xinyang zhengjiao [yisilan jiao]. Ta bushi bai ouxiang zhe.
[Yi bu la xin] chang ganxie ta [an la] de enhui [zhu]. Ta [an la] te xuan ta [yi bu la xin] bing yindao ta zou zhengdao.
Zai jinshi, wo ciyu ta xingfu; zai houshi, ta bi zai shanren zhi lie.
Ranhou, wo qishi ni [mu sheng]:“Ni dang zunxing yi bu la xin de zongjiao——zhengjiao [yisilan jiao], ta bushi bai ouxiang zhe.”
Anxiri zhishi wei dui ci fenqi zhe guiding de. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi jiang wei tamen panjue tamen suo fenqi de.

Ni dang yi zhihui [“gulanjing”] heshan yan quan ren zunxing ni de zhu de dao, ni dang yi zui hao de fangshi tong tamen bianlun. Ni de zhu zui zhidao shei beilile ta de dao, ye zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe [zhu].
Jiaru nimen yao baofu [diren huo chouren], nimen jiu yi nimen suo bei shanghai de chengdu jinxing baofu. Dan jiaru nimen jianren, na dui jianren zhe shi zui hao de [zhu].
Ni [mu sheng] dang jianren, ni de jianren bi huo an la de xiangzhu. Ni buyao wei tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] youchou, buyao wei tamen suo gao de yinmou kunao.
An la dique yu jingwei zhe he xingshan zhe tong zai.
